name: 21st World Congress on Nursing
content: We are delighted to announce 21st World Congress on Nursing which will be held during April 26-27, 2022 in Berlin, Germany. The main theme of our conference is "Exploring the New Horizons in Nursing and Healthcare." World Nursing 2022 aim is to bring leading Nurses, Clinical Nurse specialists, Nurse practitioners, Young inspired researchers, Associate Professors and Scholars together to share their experiences and research results and its development in Nursing & Health Care. Abstracts are welcome in all areas related to Nursing & Healthcare.
